game.name: FINAL FANTASY VII REMAKE INTERGRADE
game.shortDescription: Cloud Strife, an ex SOLDIER operative, decends on the mako-powered city of Midgar. The world of the timeless classic FINAL FANTASY VII is reborn, using cutting-edge graphics technology, a new battle system and an additional adventure featuring Yuffie Kisaragi.
game.genres: Action, Open World, RPG, First Person
